LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.label: New Arachnid Beehive
LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.description: The Arachne Insect Empress has descended upon the desolate Rimworld, preparing to begin building her own nest.
LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.scenario.name: New Arachnid Beehive
LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.scenario.descri: The Arachne Insect Empress has descended upon the desolate Rimworld, preparing to begin building her own nest.
LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.scenario.summar: You start the game with one Empress of the Arachne Bug race as the initial settler. There are four Arachne Bug egg sacs at the beginning.
The Empress species has arrived at the designated area.
Planetary environment inspection: habitable.
Biomass resources: Abundant.
Local native civilization: Threat level - low.
Neural network reconstruction complete. Welcome to join 'us'.

Initial directive:
Ensure the survival of the Empress species. This is the backbone.
Incubate the Arachne insect eggs and increase the population of the insect population here.
Assimilate the biomass of this area and stock up on materials that will ensure the survival of the insect population.
Rebuild the gene tree and make 'us' whole again.

For the survival of the hive.
